headline: 3 Top Stocks to Buy and Hold for 20 Years
summary: As the stock market swings wildly thanks to erratic, unpredictable, and potentially economically damaging tariff policies from the Trump administration, predicting anything in the near term about stocks has become next to impossible.  AT&T (NYSE: T), Berkshire Hathaway (NYSE: BRK.A) (NYSE: BRK.B), and IBM (NYSE: IBM) are three such companies that investors can buy and hold for the long run.  Telecom giant AT&T will certainly feel some pain if the Trump administration's tariff policy leads to an economic slowdown.
